casebody.data:
Ottis PERRY v. Campbell McDOUGALL, Sheriff of Fremont County, Wyoming. No. 4977. United States Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Nov. 15, 1954. John J. Spriggs, Sr., and John J. Spriggs, Jr., Lander, Wyo., for appellant. W. A. Smith, County and Prosecuting Atty., Fremont County, Lander, Wyo., for appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and BRATTON and PICKETT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
